languages.text: Даже местные чураются вашей компании. За целый день вам так и не удалось ни с кем поговорить — все либо молча отворачиваются, спеша по своим делам, либо с отвращением отскакивают, едва вы подходите ближе. Быть может, все дело во внешнем виде — с мутного отражения в стеклянной переборке на вас смотрит {mf|бродяга|бродяжка} с всклоченными волосами, помятым закопченным лицом и в ободранных дурнопахнущих лохмотьях.

traits.locale_text: Даже местные чураются вашей компании. За целый день вам так и не удалось ни с кем поговорить — все либо молчо отворачиваются, спеша по своим делам, либо с отвращением отскакивают, едва вы подходите ближе. Быть может, все дело во внешнем виде — в грязном отражении небольшого зеркальца вы едва узнаете сами себя. На вас смотрит {mf|бродяга|бродяжка} с всклочеными волосами, помятым закопченным лицом и в ободранных дурнопахнущих лохмотьях.

languages.text: Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out vagrant in smelly rags.
languages.original_text: Даже местные чураются вашей компании. За целый день вам так и не удалось ни с кем поговорить — все либо молча отворачиваются, спеша по своим делам, либо с отвращением отскакивают, едва вы подходите ближе. Быть может, все дело во внешнем виде — с мутного отражения в стеклянной переборке на вас смотрит {mf|бродяга|бродяжка} с всклоченными волосами, помятым закопченным лицом и в ободранных дурнопахнущих лохмотьях.

traits.locale_text: Even the locals are shunning your company. You haven't been able to talk to anyone all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it's your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out tramp dressed in smelly rags.

Even the locals are shunning your company. You haven't been able to talk to anyone all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it's your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out tramp dressed in smelly rags.

Even the locals are shunning your company. You haven't been able to talk to anyone all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it's your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out tramp dressed in smelly rags.

Even the locals shun the Rogue Trader's company. {mf|He|She} has failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as {mf|he|she} approaches them. Perhaps it is {mf|his|her} appearance. Staring hazily back at {mf|him|her} out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out tramp in smelly rags.

Even the locals shun the Rogue Trader's company. {mf|He|She} has failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as {mf|he|she} approaches them. Perhaps it is {mf|his|her} appearance. Staring hazily back at {mf|him|her} out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out tramp in smelly rags.

Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out tramp in smelly rags.

languages.text: 就连这里的人也对你避之不及。整整一天，你都没能和任何一个人搭上话。人们要么是默默地看着远处，加快步伐，要么是在你刚要接近他们时，就一脸嫌恶地朝后退去，或许是因为你的外表令人生厌吧。某个蓬头垢面、满脸油灰、衣衫褴褛的流浪汉透过玻璃舱壁，模糊地回望着你。
languages.original_text: Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out vagrant in smelly rags.

traits.locale_text: 就连这里的人也对你避之不及。整整一天，你都没能和任何一个人搭上话。人们要么是默默地看着远处，加快步伐，要么是在你刚要接近他们时，就一脸嫌恶地朝后退去，或许是因为你的外表令人生厌吧。某个蓬头垢面、满脸油灰、衣衫褴褛的流浪汉透过玻璃舱壁，模糊地回望着你。

languages.text: Incluso los habitantes de la cubierta te rehúyen. No logras hablar ni con una sola persona: la gente aparta la mirada en silencio y camina más rápido o retrocede asqueada en cuanto te acercas. Tal vez sea por tu apariencia. En el reflejo de una mampara de cristal ves una figura desgreñada, harapienta y cubierta de hollín.
languages.original_text: Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out vagrant in smelly rags.

traits.locale_text: Incluso los habitantes de la cubierta te rehúyen. No logras hablar ni con una sola persona: la gente aparta la mirada en silencio y camina más rápido o retrocede asqueada en cuanto te acercas. Tal vez sea por tu apariencia. En el reflejo de una mampara de cristal ves una figura desgreñada, harapienta y cubierta de hollín.

languages.text: 現地の者ですらあなたを敬遠する。あなたは、一日中、一人にも話しかけることができない。近づいても人々は黙って目をそらしたり、早足で過ぎ去ったり、はたまたうんざりした様子で背を向ける。おそらく、その見た目のせいだろう。ガラス張り隔壁からぼんやりと見つめ返すのは、ボサボサの髪ですすけた顔の、悪臭を放つ布きれをまとったボロボロの浮浪者である。
languages.original_text: Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out vagrant in smelly rags.

traits.locale_text: 現地の者ですらローグトレーダーを敬遠する。ローグトレーダーは、一日中、一人にも話しかけることができない。近づいても人々は黙って目をそらしたり、早足で過ぎ去ったり、はたまたうんざりした様子で背を向ける。おそらく、その見た目のせいだろう。ガラス張り隔壁からぼんやりと見つめ返すのは、ボサボサの髪ですすけた顔の、悪臭を放つ布きれをまとったボロボロの浮浪者である。
現地の者ですらあなたを敬遠する。あなたは、一日中、一人にも話しかけることができない。近づいても人々は黙って目をそらしたり、早足で過ぎ去ったり、はたまたうんざりした様子で背を向ける。おそらく、その見た目のせいだろう。ガラス張り隔壁からぼんやりと見つめ返すのは、ボサボサの髪ですすけた顔の、悪臭を放つ布きれをまとったボロボロの浮浪者である。

languages.text: Selbst die Einheimischen meiden dich. Du hast es den ganzen Tag lang nicht geschafft, mit jemandem zu reden. Sobald du dich jemandem näherst, wenden die Leute schweigend den Blick ab und gehen rasch weiter oder schrecken angewidert zurück. Vielleicht liegt es an deinem Aussehen. Aus einem gläsernen Schott starrt dich benommen ein zerzauster und erschöpfter Landstreicher in stinkenden Lumpen an.
languages.original_text: Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out vagrant in smelly rags.

traits.locale_text: Selbst die Einheimischen meiden dich. Du hast es den ganzen Tag lang nicht geschafft, mit jemandem zu reden. Sobald du dich jemandem näherst, wenden die Leute schweigend den Blick ab und gehen rasch weiter oder schrecken angewidert zurück. Vielleicht liegt es an deinem Aussehen. Aus einem gläsernen Schott starrt dich benommen ein zerzauster und erschöpfter Landstreicher in stinkenden Lumpen an.

Selbst die Einheimischen meiden {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. {mf|Er|Sie} hat es den ganzen Tag lang nicht geschafft, mit jemandem zu reden. Sobald {mf|er|sie} sich jemandem nähert, blicken die Leute entweder schweigend weg und gehen schnell weiter oder schrecken angewidert zurück. Vielleicht liegt es an {mf|seinem|ihrem} Erscheinungsbild. Aus einem gläsernen Schott starrt {mf|ihn benommen ein zerzauster, dreckverschmierter, erschöpfter Landstreicher|sie benommen eine zerzauste, dreckverschmierte, erschöpfte Landstreicherin} in stinkenden Lumpen an.

languages.text: Même les locaux fuient votre compagnie. Vous n'avez pas réussi à parler à une seule personne de toute la journée : soit les gens regardent ailleurs en accélérant, soit ils se reculent avec dégoût lorsque vous les approchez. Peut-être est-ce lié à votre apparence. Un vagabond hirsute et couvert de suie vêtu de haillons puants vous rend votre regard de l'autre côté de la cloison en verre.
languages.original_text: Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out vagrant in smelly rags.

traits.locale_text: Même les locaux fuient votre compagnie. Vous n'avez pas réussi à parler à une seule personne de toute la journée : soit les gens regardent ailleurs en accélérant, soit ils se reculent avec dégoût lorsque vous les approchez. Peut-être est-ce lié à votre apparence. Un vagabond hirsute et couvert de suie vêtu de haillons puants vous rend votre regard de l'autre côté de la cloison en verre.

languages.text: Güverte sakinleri bile senden uzak duruyor. Gün boyunca kimseyle konuşmayı başaramıyorsun: İnsanlar ya sessizce uzaklara bakıp adımlarını hızlandırıyor ya da yanına gelir gelmez tiksintiyle geri çekiliyorlar. Bunun sebebi, görünüşün olabilir. Cam bir duvarın arkasında, kirli yüzlü, külle kaplı ve yıpranmış paçavralar giymiş bir dilenci; bulanık gözlerle sana bakıyor.
languages.original_text: Even the locals shun your company. You have failed to talk to a single person all day: people either look away silently and walk faster or recoil in disgust as soon as you approach them. Perhaps it is your appearance. Staring hazily back at you out of a glass bulkhead is a shaggy, sooty-faced, worn-out vagrant in smelly rags.

traits.locale_text: Güverte sakinleri bile senden uzak duruyor. Gün boyunca kimseyle konuşmayı başaramıyorsun: İnsanlar ya sessizce uzaklara bakıp adımlarını hızlandırıyor ya da yanına gelir gelmez tiksintiyle geri çekiliyorlar. Bunun sebebi, görünüşün olabilir. Cam bir duvarın arkasında, kirli yüzlü, külle kaplı ve yıpranmış paçavralar giymiş bir dilenci; bulanık gözlerle sana bakıyor.
